refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function gets a value of an extended attribute named name of a file path.

Extended attributes have two different namespaces: user and root namespace. User namespace is available for all users while root namespace is available only for user with root privileges. xattr operates on user namespace by default, but you can change that using flags argument.

row.entry: Do not follow the symbolic link but operate on symbolic link itself.
Set attribute in root (trusted) namespace. Requires root privileges.

refsect1.para: Returns string with value or &false; if attribute doesn't exist.

example.title: xattr_get example
example.para: The following code checks if system administrator has signed the file.
example.programlisting:
<?php
$file = '/usr/local/sbin/some_binary';
$signature = xattr_get($file, 'Root signature', XATTR_ROOT);

/* ... check if $signature is valid ... */

?>

refsect1.para: See also xattr_set, xattr_remove, xattr_list, xattr_supported.
